summary: The document is a forensic analysis report from ABC Forensic Services Laboratory regarding a Glock 17 pistol with an obliterated serial number. The serial number was restored to XXX999US, and a query revealed the firearm was reported stolen by Mark Toler in 2002. The analysis links the firearm to a theft incident in Bramblewood County.
conclusion: The serial number of the Glock 17 pistol was successfully restored and matched to a stolen firearm reported by Mark Toler in 2002.

events.details: Restoration of the obliterated serial number on a Glock 17 pistol to XXX999US.
Mark Toler reported the firearm stolen in Bramblewood County.

description: Black in color Glock 17 pistol, 9x19 mm caliber with restored serial number XXX999US
Unloaded black in color Glock 9mm magazine
